creator: Active Developers
descriptionHtml:
Hello Agent!

This is my attempt to create companion app for Ubisoft's new game Tom Clancy's The Division 2. This app currently has weekly vendor reset information and information about weapons, gears, gearsets, talents as per warlords of new york expansion in Tom Clancy's The Division 2.

Weekly vendors: Information is for gear items and weapons available at various vendors in game.
Weapons: Information like damage range, RPM, reload speed, DPS etc are mentioned in app that i obtained from various sources available in community at the moment.

More information might be added in the future. Information will be updated as per game updates.

If you want to report a bug or pass on suggestion please use Twitter link provided inside the app.

This is a initial drop of the app, more features and information will be added in future.

Support my work by spreading positive words about the app.

This companion app currently has weekly vendor reset information and weapons information only and i am working to add more.
descriptionShort: The Division 2 Companion App! Weekly Vendor, Game Partner, Guide, Database, Help

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
0.10 beta
Added link for vendor information.
Removed unused section.

0.9 beta
Added section for named gear.
Temporarily disabled vendor section. will enable soon.
Fixed a minor UI crash.

0.8 beta
Added gearsets, weapon talents, chestpiece talents and backpack talents.
Fix a rare app crash issue.

0.7 beta
Added brandsets info for new Warlords Of New York update.

descriptionShort: The Division 2 Companion App! Weekly Vendor, Game Partner, Guide, Database, Help

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
0.14
- Performance and UI bug fixes on top of previous version. Make sure you update to this, otherwise your app might lag.

0.12
- Added new DPS section.
- Improved image quality on existing sections.
- Reduced memory requirement.

0.11
- New exotic weapons and gears section.
- New named weapons and gears section.
- Updated values for latest update of the game.
- TU 12.1+ data updated in most sections.
- 100% performance improvements in handling images.
